DOC.brief_summary: Currently publish study compare efficacy Chloraprep povidone-iodine decrease postoperative- wound infection cesarean section . However , study involve type surgery compare efficacy different type preoperative cleansing agent prevent postoperative wound infection . These study show controversy exists antiseptic skin preparation effective prevent postoperative surgical wound infection . The standard care Los Angeles County Hospital preoperative skin antiseptic cesarean section povidone- iodine 10 % ( betadine ) , however many hospital make transition use Chloraprep . In attempt improve current standard care , propose quality improvement prospective randomize study compare difference postoperative wound complication use povidone- iodine Chloraprep preoperative antiseptic cesarean section . We hypothesize Chloraprep good Betadine reduce incidence positive bacterial culture follow cesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Chlorhexidine Gluconate Versus Povidone Iodine Cesarean Delivery : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman great 36 week gestation present schedule repeat cesarean section schedule primary cesarean section Ages 1845 Written inform consent obtain Patients take antimicrobial therapy reason Patient know allergy one prepping agent Patients currently take immunosuppressant drug Active acute chronic infection Current history cancer Open wound , skin ulcer , sore , severe acne History methicillinresistant staphylococcus aureus colonization oxacillinresistant staphylococcus aureus colonization
